author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-903: timestamp checking for new ftp files to download is disabled by default now. Its not reliable across FTP servers. Clocks for client and server could be out-of-time and FTP servers only return time as HH:mm not with seconds. Timestamp check will be removed in Camel 2.0

author: bentmann
msg: o Migrated core IT 0017 over to the corresponding plugin project

author: hlship
msg: Delete early 5.0.15 tag, in prep for revised one

author: hlship
msg: Tag trunk to create the 5.1 branch

author: scheu
msg: * (Nick) Improved ProviderDispatcher to detect faults and add them to the JAXWS message object as XMLFaults.
* (Nick) Updated the Provider<Source> test and FaultTests to verify this path.
* (Rich) Improved the Block.getQName code to tolerate content that does not have a qname.
* (Rich) Updated the Provider<Source> and Provider<String> tests to verify the no QName toleration path.
